original_text: better than the tepid star trek : insurrection ; falls short of first contact because the villain couldn't pick the lint off borg queen alice krige's cape ; and finishes half a parsec ( a nose ) ahead of generations .
generated_text:
1. "Better than the lackluster Star Wars: The Phantom Menace; falls short of The Empire Strikes Back due to a subpar lightsaber duel; and finishes a parsec ahead of Attack of the Clones."
2. "Far superior to the mediocre The Matrix Reloaded; fails to reach the heights of The Matrix due to a poorly executed plot twist; and surpasses The Matrix Revolutions."
3. "More enjoyable than the dull Spider-Man 3; doesn't quite live up to Spider-Man 2 due to a lackluster villain; and edges out Spider-Man."
4. "Better than the uninspired X-Men: The Last Stand; falls short of X2: X-Men United due to a weak mutant villain; and finishes ahead of X-Men."
